dublin_core.dcvalue: In this paper we analyze the problems in home healthcare communication and we propose an approach for communication between different technologies implementing a new protocol We use XML to define the communication frames stored data and the accessibility We also propose the ways to access to the information from anywhere using criteria of security accessibility and the possibility of defining models of actuation before critical situations
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:19:09Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2007-11-16
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
An approach based on XML for communication in home healthcare systems.
